tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE material_deliveries (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(50),
  delivery_date DATE,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE material_deliveries (
    delivery_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    delivery_date DATE,
    quantity INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    inventory_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_history (
    delivery_id UUID,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    delivery_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    PRIMARY KEY (delivery_id, delivery_date)
)

CREATE TABLE delivery_history (
  delivery_id INT,
  supplier_id INT,
  delivery_date DATE,
  material_name VARCHAR(50),
  delivery_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE material_deliveries (
    delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    delivery_date DATE,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_history (
    delivery_id INT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    material_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
